--0-764194354-1073240595=:34152
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

A craft, appearently Minicon, flew over the bounty hunter.  He transformed into his transmetal 2 t-rex beast form and pursued it to its destination. 

Jerame Johnson <jeramej@...> wrote:New Hope: A ship is flying in this new guys direction unaware of the new commer. It just seems to be on a normal flight. As it gets closer it's markings are better shown as a Minicon user.

bustercross365 <bustercross365@...> wrote: A few hours later...

The pilot managed the get out from under some of the wreckage.  He 
gathered his weapons and what little equipment he could salvage.  
Before he set out, he located as best he could the closest base.  
"At best, two bases worth interest.  I will find my quarry later.  
Now I need to find a place to rest, the Predacons and Maximals are 
certainly on the way to investigate the crash."
The bounty hunter exited after setting his traps, hoping to run into 
someone out in this wilderness.

OOC- Ok, Anyone can hopefully run into my character.  It can be 
anyone, I don't care.  Just find him.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "bustercross365" <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> The small craft cruised through the area of controversy, the spot 
> where Megatron II and the Maximal ship Axalon disappeared.  The 
> ship's onboard computer reported to its pilot the area was full of 
> subspace instabilities.
> <Hmmm, so their trans-warp dives must has interacted with the 
> instabilities.> the pilot theorized.
> "Computer, use avalible jump data to jump the same way the Axalon 
and 
> Nemesis did."
> The computer complied, and was ready to jump through time.
> "Engage transwarp drive."
> The ship jumped into warp space, and shortly was found in the Sol 
> system, near Prehistoric Earth.  The craft somehow sustained major 
> damage, and was sent careening down, to crash on the North american 
> continent.

<DIV>A craft, appearently Minicon, flew over the bounty hunter.  He transformed into his transmetal 2 t-rex beast form and pursued it to its destination. <BR><BR><B><I>Jerame Johnson <jeramej@...></I></B> wrote:
<BLOCKQUOTE class=replbq style="PADDING-LEFT: 5px; MARGIN-LEFT: 5px; BORDER-LEFT: #1010ff 2px solid">
<DIV>New Hope: A ship is flying in this new guys direction unaware of the new commer. It just seems to be on a normal flight. As it gets closer it's markings are better shown as a Minicon user.<BR><BR><B><I>bustercross365 <bustercross365@...></I></B> wrote: 
<BLOCKQUOTE class=replbq style="PADDING-LEFT: 5px; MARGIN-LEFT: 5px; BORDER-LEFT: #1010ff 2px solid"><TT>A few hours later...<BR><BR>The pilot managed the get out from under some of the wreckage.  He <BR>gathered his weapons and what little equipment he could salvage.  <BR>Before he set out, he located as best he could the closest base.  <BR>"At best, two bases worth interest.  I will find my quarry later.  <BR>Now I need to find a place to rest, the Predacons and Maximals are <BR>certainly on the way to investigate the crash."<BR>The bounty hunter exited after setting his traps, hoping to run into <BR>someone out in this wilderness.<BR><BR>OOC- Ok, Anyone can hopefully run into my character.  It can be <BR>anyone, I don't care.  Just find him.<BR><BR><BR>--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "bustercross365" <bustercross365@y...> <BR>wrote:<BR>> The small craft cruised through the area of controversy, the spot <BR>> where Megatron II and the
 Maximal ship Axalon disappeared.  The <BR>> ship's onboard computer reported to its pilot the area was full of <BR>> subspace instabilities.<BR>> <Hmmm, so their trans-warp dives must has interacted with the <BR>> instabilities.> the pilot theorized.<BR>> "Computer, use avalible jump data to jump the same way the Axalon <BR>and <BR>> Nemesis did."<BR>> The computer complied, and was ready to jump through time.<BR>> "Engage transwarp drive."<BR>> The ship jumped into warp space, and shortly was found in the Sol <BR>> system, near Prehistoric Earth.  The craft somehow sustained major <BR>> damage, and was sent careening down, to crash on the North american <BR>> continent.<BR><BR></TT><BR><TT>
